channel.title: Sequel Ace on Rick Daalhuizen
channel.description: Recent content in Sequel Ace on Rick Daalhuizen

item.title: Moving from Sequel Pro to Sequel Ace
item.description: Sequel Pro is an open-source SQL Client for MacOS, and for many Developers (myself included) the must-have tool when dealing with a SQL server. It’s fast, has an easy interface, and is very intuitive to use. You may have noticed that in recent years little has changed in terms of features and how it looks. After some recent updates in MacOS, I keep running into new bugs in Sequel Pro:
